com.onkiup.minedroid.gui.views

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.onkiup.minedroid.gui.events.EventBase
      • com.onkiup.minedroid.gui.views.View
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Context
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContentView

    public class View
extends EventBase
implements Context
    Parent class for all View elements.

    • Method Detail

      • onDraw

        public void onDraw()
        Draws this view

      • setBackground

        public void setBackground(Drawable background)
        Changes view background
        Parameters:
        background - New view background

      • measure

        public View.Layout measure(Point boundaries)
        This method should determine the View size and should be called by parent ONLY if the child layout width or height equals WRAP_CONTENT otherwise parent SHOULD calculate item size by itself

        Result item size SHOULD be set by resolveLayout after it was calculated

        Parameters:
        boundaries - max element size
        Returns:
        measured layout

      • setLayoutWeight

        public void setLayoutWeight(int weight)
        Set weight for automatic width/height calculation
        Parameters:
        weight - item weight

        Returns:
        View's weight

        Returns:
        View's resolved layout

      • resolveLayout

        public void resolveLayout(View.Layout layout)
        This method is used by parent to set view size after it was measured
        Parameters:
        layout - resolved layout

      • unresolveLayout

        public void unresolveLayout()
        Unsets previously resolved layout
